trans-unit.source: Renders the 2-D children within the specified 3-D viewport bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ez a beállítás a 2-D gyermekek megadott 3D nézőpont határain belül.

trans-unit.source: Viewport2DVisual3D enables you to place interactive 2-D content on a 3-D object.
trans-unit.target: A Viewport2DVisual3D interaktív 2D tartalom elhelyezése egy 3D objektum teszi lehetővé.

trans-unit.source: Its counterpart is the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport3DVisual> class, which is a 2-D visual with 3-D children.
trans-unit.target: A megfelelő van a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport3DVisual>osztály, amely a 2-D visual 3D gyermekkel rendelkező.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport3DVisual>

trans-unit.source: Viewport2DVisual3D is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Viewport2DVisual3D is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
Gets or sets a cached representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a gyorsítótárazott megjelenítése a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Set the CacheMode property when you need to increase performance for content that is time-consuming to render.
trans-unit.target: Állítsa be a CacheMode tulajdonságot, ha a tartalom, amely időigényes lehet megjeleníteni a teljesítmény növelése van szüksége.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D> class projects 3-D content into 2-D to size the 2-D content in the 3-D element correctly.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D>osztály 3D tartalom projektek a 2-D 3D elem 2-D tartalma megfelelően méretezhetők.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D>

trans-unit.source: Because caching always relies on the element’s size, instead of the transform applied to it, when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CacheMode> property, initially your content may appear pixilated.
trans-unit.target: Mivel az elem mérete helyett alkalmazni kell, ha úgy állítja be az átalakítás mindig gyorsítótárazás alapul a <xref:System.Windows.Media.CacheMode>tulajdonság, először a tartalom jelenhetnek meg pixilated.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CacheMode>

trans-unit.source: This is because it is being upsampled to a much larger size than it was cached at.
trans-unit.target: Ennek oka az, melynél upsampled sokkal nagyobb méretűre, mint a került a gyorsítótárba.

trans-unit.source: You can correct this situation by increasing the local size of your 2-D visual by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ebben az esetben javíthatja ki úgy, hogy a 2-D visual helyi méretének növelésével az <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>vagy <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>Tulajdonságok.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, you can increase the <xref:System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache.RenderAtScale%2A> on the CacheMode until the content reaches an acceptable level of clarity.
trans-unit.target: Emellett növelheti a <xref:System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache.RenderAtScale%2A>a CacheMode, amíg a tartalom egyértelműség elfogadható szintű eléri a.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache.RenderAtScale%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CacheMode"></xref> that holds a cached representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CacheMode"> </xref> , amely tárolja a gyorsítótárazott megjelenítése a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.CacheMode*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the 3-D geometry for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a 3D geometriai ez <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Geometry is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
The 3-D geometry for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.Geometry*> dependency property.
GeometryProperty is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
To be added.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial*> attached property for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Értékét a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial*>csatolt tulajdonság a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial*>

trans-unit.source: GetIsVisualHostMaterial is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
The element from which the property value is read.
trans-unit.target: Az elem, amelyből a tulajdonság értékének olvasható.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial*> property value for the element.
To be added.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial*> attached property.
IsVisualHostMaterialProperty is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
To be added.
Gets or sets the material that describes the appearance of the 3-D object.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a 3D objektum megjelenését meghatározó az anyag.

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial%2A> attached property on the material on which you wish to have the 2-D visual placed.
trans-unit.target: Meg kell adni a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial%2A>tulajdonságát az anyag, amely rendelkezik a 2-D visual elhelyezett szeretne csatolni.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial%2A>

trans-unit.source: Material is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
The material for the 3-D object.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.Material*> dependency property.
MaterialProperty is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
To be added.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial*> attached property to a specified element.
trans-unit.target: Az értéke a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial*>csatolt tulajdonság a megadott elem.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial*>

trans-unit.source: SetIsVisualHostMaterial is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
The element to which the attached property is written.
trans-unit.target: Az elem, amelyre a csatolt tulajdonság írása.

trans-unit.source: The required <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial*> value.
Gets or sets the 2-D visual to be placed on the 3-D object.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a 3D objektum elhelyezését a 2-D visual.

trans-unit.source: The visual is first applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>, which is then used on the 3-D object.
trans-unit.target: A visual először alkalmazzák a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>, majd a 3D objektum használt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>

trans-unit.source: Visual is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
The visual to be placed on the 3-D object.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport2DVisual3D.Visual*> dependency property.
VisualProperty is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
To be added.
